nodes.bodyText:
Is it like this on master branch?
This seems extreme for a test? We have to do this?
This was part of Duo's https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-24633, checked into master but not back ported.

I don't see this change over in https://github.com/apache/hbase/pull/2003/files
There are conflicts w/ this patch?
Thanks @clarax
Not sure what that PR was not in this branch but there shouldn't be conflicts.
